attributes.action: change the way puppies and other animals are refused emergency treatment at pdsa due to catchment areas and how the sick the animal is
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am starting this petition for justice for genisis my cousins puppy that died due to not receiving treatment fast enough. i feel very strongly about animals being refused treatment due to state of illness and catchment areas. This should not be the case. Any animal should be intitled to emergency treatment when required and not turned away. please sign this petition we want justice for all animals that have been refused emergency treatment!

rejection.details: PDSA is a private charity, not a Government organisation, and the PM and Government cannot change the way it operates.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
